Preventive Medicine.name: Preventive Medicine
Preventive Medicine.flavor: When an enemy attacks your friend, lightning arcs from your dragon mark into the enemy, shocking it and healing your ally.
Preventive Medicine.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits an ally
Preventive Medicine.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the triggering ally can spend a healing surge and gain an additional 2d6 hit points.

Jade Rejuvenation.name: Jade Rejuvenation
Jade Rejuvenation.flavor: Your dragon mark glows a faint green. Sigils identical to the mark then appear over the heads of your friends.
Jade Rejuvenation.target: You and each ally in the burst
Jade Rejuvenation.effect: You lose one healing surge, and each target gains regeneration 5 until the end of your next turn.

Dawn Burst.name: Dawn Burst
Dawn Burst.flavor: The sun seems to flare from your dragon mark, flashing its light on friend and foe alike.
Dawn Burst.effect: Each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge or make a saving throw.
